動物用藥品名稱: 馬爾他雞新城病、家禽霍亂不活化混合疫苗
效能(適應症): 預防雞新城病及家禽霍亂。
ingredients: INACTIVATED NEWCASTLE DISEASE VIRUS: 10^9EID50 BEFORE INACTIVATIONPASTEURELLA MULTOCIDA SEROTYPE 1  2X10^9CFU(BEFORE INACTIVATED)PASTEURELLA MULTOCIDA SEROTYPE 3  2X10^9CFU(BEFORE INACTIVATED)PASTEURELLA MULTOCIDA SEROTYPE 4  2X10^9CFU(BEFORE INACTIVATED)SORBITAN MONOOLEATE 0.037ML; LIGHT MINERAL OIL 0.337ML;THIOMERSAL 50UG.
